sub_title: Life Coach Consultant I Certified Facilitator of the Work of Byron Katie I MIRJOY Founder CEO | Inspirational Author
summary:
My life's path has been a remarkable journey, defined by growth, connection, and the pursuit of personal fulfillment. As the founder and director of MIRJOY, I have dedicated myself to empowering individuals through the transformative practices for example of the Work of Byron Katie, Tony Robbins, Jeff Foster and so on. With over a decade of experience in questioning my own limiting beliefs, I have discovered the immense power of self-examination and its ability to unlock true inner strength.

Guiding both adults and children, I have had the privilege of coaching individuals in the art of examining stressful concepts. Through tailored strategies and a range of empowering tools, I help them reconnect with their inner reservoirs of strength and develop a friendly mind that can navigate any challenge with grace and resilience.

My journey of education has been diverse, encompassing multiple degrees, including a Bachelor's degree in Economics. I have worked over two decades in information technology and helping people has been something I've always loved. 

During my time living in New Zealand, both in the vibrant city of Auckland and the breathtaking Queenstown, I experienced the beauty of cultural diversity and the transformative power of embracing different perspectives. It was in this enriching environment that I further honed my coaching skills and developed a deep understanding of the complexities that arise from cultural transitions.

Returning to The Netherlands, I now reside with my family, cherishing the role of both a mother and stepmother. Through personal experience, I have gained profound insights into the challenges that arise in parenting and step-parenting, fostering a natural intuition for coaching (step)parents who may be feeling overwhelmed. 

My personal journey has been one of continuous growth and self-discovery, and it is an honor to share the wisdom and tools I have acquired with others. Together, through the transformative practices offered at MIRJOY, we can embark on a journey of empowerment, embracing joy, and unlocking the boundless potential that lies within each and every one of us.

Join me at MIRJOY and let us embark on this transformative journey together. Contact me today to start your path to personal empowerment and fulfillment.

school.name: The School of the Work of Byron Katie

certifications.name: Certified Facilitator The Work of Byron Katie

profile_positions.description:
The happiness of your life depends upon the quality of your thoughts. - Marcus Aurelius

At MIRJOY, we believe in the transformative power of questioning your thoughts and taking charge of your mental well-being. If you've ever wondered how to influence the quality of your thoughts or struggled with limiting beliefs or a busy mind, we have the solution you've been seeking.

Are you caught in a relentless cycle of negative thoughts? Does your racing mind leave you feeling overwhelmed? Rather than resorting to temporary distractions or suppression, it's time to explore a more effective approach.

Embrace the Truth: Not every thought you have is true, and pushing them away only intensifies their grip. Break free from the chains of your uncontrollable mind and discover a different way to regain control.

With expert guidance and proven techniques, you can escape the cycle of negativity and find lasting peace of mind. Our proven methods help you invite your thoughts in, write them down, and effectively sort them out. It's a simple yet powerful practice. We will coach you, so you can truly transform your relationship with your mind by yourself.

Don't let your thoughts dictate your happiness. We understand where you are in your journey, and we are here to guide you every step of the way. Step onto a new path and experience the freedom that comes with a transformed mindset. Contact us today to begin your transformative journey with MIRJOY.
profile_positions.title: Certified Life Coach

profile_positions.description:
Quintiq develops advanced planning & scheduling software that allows organizations to overcome the difficulty of planning the utilization of employees, resources and processes, with multiple rules and constraints.

Responsibilities
In my role as Salesforce Administrator I manage the Quintiq Salesforce.com platform for all users worldwide. Besides being responsible for the configuration and further development of Quintiq’s CRM application, I also take care of User training and managing Salesforce Support internally. It is my responsibility as well to define, communicate and manage the Release Process and to develop and implement new applications and updates to existing applications. I ensure that Salesforce is an effective business tool meeting the needs of our users and make optimum use of the application capabilities.
profile_positions.title: Certified Salesforce.com Administrator

profile_positions.description:
Gen-i is a member of the Telecom New Zealand Group and brings together IT and telecommunications services for Australasian businesses needing it for purpose hosted services through to fully integrated business solutions. 
  
Responsibilities
In my role as Salesforce Administrator I am responsible for supporting and the configuration and further development of Gen-i’s (Salesforce.com, Enterprise edition, 1080 licenses) CRM application ’Customer Central’. I my day to day work I ensure that Customer Central is an effective business tool meeting the needs of our users and make optimum use of the application capabilities. I take the lead in implementing mechanisms and processes to continually improve the accuracy, consistency and integrity of the data contained in Customer Central.
 
Achievements
I have established myself to become a successful Administrator by balancing helping people on a day to day basis and making sure I meet the set deadlines for technical development, which resulted in achieving or over achieving my set deliverables for the last two years in a row.
profile_positions.title: Certified Salesforce.com Administrator

profile_positions.description:
AJ Hackett opened the world’s first commercial Bungy in1988 at the Kawarau Bridge.

Responsibilities
In my role as Supervisor I was responsible for running the daily operations of the Bungy site. I was responsible for keeping my team motivated and focused so we made our jump and revenue target while giving the best customer service. In my role I needed to be flexible and creative to make sure that everything ran smoothly between Frontline and the Jump Crew ensuring that our customers had an unforgettable experience.

Achievements
I managed my team successfully through difficult and stressful situations by guiding them and bringing out the best in them personally while making target and giving the customer the best
experience possible.
profile_positions.title: Site Supervisor Kawarau Bridge

profile_positions.description:
High Modulus is a world leading supplier of composite technology and structural engineering services to the marine industry.

Responsibilities
In my role as Marketing Manager I developed the planning and implementation of all Marketing activities in New Zealand, Australia and China within time and budget and in line with the
strategic goals and objectives, reporting to the Chief Marketing Officer. 

Achievements
I developed several successful domestic and international marketing campaigns such as: event management of international trade shows, direct mailings, design of a complete new booth, corporate DVD, press coverage, case studies and maintenance of the website.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Coordinator

profile_positions.description:
Crossware is IBM business partner specializing in the IBM Lotus range of products. Crossware specialize in bespoke application development as well as standard products including: CRM, Document Management, Knowledge Bases, and Crossware Mail Signature.

Responsibilities
In my role as Account Manager I am responsible for maintaining key existing relationships with Crossware and its existing clients to continue growth of the revenue of the business.  I am also responsible for the development of Marketing campaigns for the International and Domestic market to generate new leads.

Achievements
• Closing new business deals of more then fifty thousands NZ$’s selling CRM systems for Lotus Notes.  
• Development of several successful Marketing campaigns such as: international and national email and direct mail campaigns, Trade shows, Telemarketing campaigns, Press releases such as: publication of several Case Stories in iStart magazine
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

profile_positions.description: Spinning is a 50-minute indoor ‘cycling’ (and fitness) workout. Being a spinning instructor, I have developed my leadership skills successfully: during the class I motivate and stimulate the riders set their ultimate cardio challenge, and stimulate them to achieve their personal goals. I worked as a spinning instructor in the evenings, once a week while having a full time job as Marketing Manager for Business Base during the day.
profile_positions.title: Spinning Instructor

profile_positions.description:
Business Base develops, sells and implements Customer Relations Management (CRM) business software for professional services organizations (PSA). 

Responsibilities
In my role as Marketing & Communication Manager I was responsible for the Marketing & Communications Department. I create the annual Marketing & Communications plan focused on generating quality leads. I am responsible for the execution of the plan within time and budget. 

Achievements
• Development of a complete new house style and logo for Business Base. As part of that I created a new effective website with a new ‘look and feel’. 
• Increase of sales in two years with 60% because of quality leads generated by effective Marketing campaigns. 
• Initiated the idea to create a new software product especially for the smaller companies. The software can only be downloaded and bought through the internet. I developed the website for this product.
profile_positions.title: Marketing Manager

profile_positions.description:
QAD Netherlands, part of QAD Inc. located in the USA, develops ERP software MFG/PRO. QAD is listed on the NASDAQ stock exchange and has 1275 employees worldwide in 26 different countries with annual earnings of $225M USD.

Responsibilities
As an Account Manager I was responsible for the relationships with 50 customers of the Dutch installed base and for advising them on how to use the MFG/PRO software to improve their company processes. Collaborating with the customer we looked for the best solutions available, which could range from selling consultancy days to the implementation of additional software modules.

Achievements
• Achievement of 90% of my target which was 1.1 Million USD in total. Without having any sales experience. 
• Closing deals of more then in excess of 200,000 USD selling software and consultancy days.
profile_positions.title: Account Manager

volunteer_experiences.description:
StarJam offers disabled kids an opportunity to stand proudly in the performance spotlight. Through my manager Andrew Seerden I heard about the lovely work StarJam does. It didnt take long before I wanted to be part of this as well. As a volunteer I help facilitating StarJam's monthly get-togethers.

Besides the monthly get-togethers StarJam offers The Talent Expansion Programme, that is what the kids call CoolJam workshops. Workshops are held on each week during school term evenings. I am a relief tutor for the dance workshop.

Working together with the kids, helping them express themselves by dancing is truly beautiful and I very much enjoy it.

Check out http://www.starjam.org
